<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass deletes dead arguments from internal functions.  Dead argument</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elimination removes arguments which are directly dead, as well as arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only passed into function calls as dead arguments of other functions.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass also deletes dead return values in a similar way.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass is often useful as a cleanup pass to run after aggressive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interprocedural passes, which add possibly-dead arguments or return values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;IPO&#95;DEADARGUMENTELIMINATION&#95;H</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// During our initial pass over the program, we determine that things are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// either alive or maybe alive. We don&#39;t mark anything explicitly dead (even</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// if we know they are), since anything not alive with no registered uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (in Uses) will never be marked alive and will thus become dead in the end.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964a8cb9173f3fd92152f18401c8bf8ba21b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964">Liveness</a> &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964a8cb9173f3fd92152f18401c8bf8ba21b">Live</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a3dee2ca18ff5275c99041264099fd964af29a24ceeaaae7277109ac9c7a52d958">MaybeLive</a> &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Convenience wrapper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a9536f679d7b90e4dc0db3510ab67dce2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/retorarg">RetOrArg</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a9536f679d7b90e4dc0db3510ab67dce2">createArg</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/retorarg">RetOrArg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, Idx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a9cbc5f82a665596b0ff5d374dcf9d01c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a9cbc5f82a665596b0ff5d374dcf9d01c">UseMap</a> = std::multimap&lt;RetOrArg, RetOrArg&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This maps a return value or argument to any MaybeLive return values or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// arguments it uses. This allows the MaybeLive values to be marked live</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// when any of its users is marked live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example (indices are left out for clarity):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  - Uses&#91;ret F&#93; = ret G</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    This means that F calls G, and F returns the value returned by G.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  - Uses&#91;arg F&#93; = ret G</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    This means that some function calls G and passes its result as an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    argument to F.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  - Uses&#91;ret F&#93; = arg F</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    This means that F returns one of its own arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///  - Uses&#91;arg F&#93; = arg G</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    This means that G calls F and passes one of its own (G&#39;s) arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    directly to F.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#afb15aeeba5e11ad17b03524730d51b7d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a9cbc5f82a665596b0ff5d374dcf9d01c">UseMap</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#afb15aeeba5e11ad17b03524730d51b7d">Uses</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#adccc69f6d0152bec28db15a70cf05587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#adccc69f6d0152bec28db15a70cf05587">LiveSet</a> = std::set&lt;RetOrArg&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a1eb5a2eac80c369977d7c8747be838ba"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a1eb5a2eac80c369977d7c8747be838ba">LiveFuncSet</a> = std::set&lt;const Function &#42;&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This set contains all values that have been determined to be live.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a404cb9e3e1fb3992697a27bd58e44a68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#adccc69f6d0152bec28db15a70cf05587">LiveSet</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a404cb9e3e1fb3992697a27bd58e44a68">LiveValues</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This set contains all values that are cannot be changed in any way.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#aa1991a5019f642f03694439d95fa1b20"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a1eb5a2eac80c369977d7c8747be838ba">LiveFuncSet</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#aa1991a5019f642f03694439d95fa1b20">LiveFunctions</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a0fc4b7b5727b4a936d7c1c23320a8b12"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a0fc4b7b5727b4a936d7c1c23320a8b12">UseVector</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;RetOrArg, 5&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This allows this pass to do double-duty as the dead arg hacking pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (used only by bugpoint).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a997b16dfcd40407daf7b4e5b27dbcecf"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/deadargumenteliminationpass/#a997b16dfcd40407daf7b4e5b27dbcecf">ShouldHackArguments</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
